(I thought Xiane was carring Spears to the CR chamber room?  Also, 
how much longer till the bomb goes off?  I have Shadow Wing trying to 
get to the bridge. She doesn't know about the bomb yet.)

> (Ok, I truly don't mean to make these seem like I want my way, 
hell,

and

>

the

at
